casebody.data:
Peggy HOOKER, Substitute Administratrix D.B.N, for the Estate of Edward C. Wagner
v.
Mary B. WAGNER, a/k/a Mary B. Shaulis, Rose M. Blough and Kenneth E. Blough, and S & T Bank Petition of: Rose M. Blough and Kenneth E. Blough No. 358 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 27, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 27th day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
